website_summaries.verdict: Get this scooter started by twisting your feet, then perform some tricks.
pros: Performs tricks such as kick-outs, side drifts, and spin-outs
Fun and easy first scooter for kids

customer_reviews.title: Very Dangerous..
customer_reviews.text: Sorry this thing is dangerous! Kids had fun, but one is 7 and other is 16, the oldest is an experienced skate board rider , he was just messing around on his little brother present. Both were hurt that day.. .when it spins you fall.. I have bought the v shaped ones in past.N both loved them.. This one is not the same.. Telling you it's dangerous!! I am amazed no one has.mentioned it.
customer_reviews.author: L. labean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ride
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my daughter since my 3 boys already had one each. She was feeling left out so I ordered it and she was so excited. This scooter is a very nice ride, they spin on it, they glide on it, just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter for Outdoor Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this scooter for over 3 years and the kids still love to use it. Kids aged 5 to 9. have all used it successfully, and have managed to learn to do spin tricks and drift turns. Works best on a smooth concrete surface, very difficult to ride up any kind of slope. Your propel the scooter forwards by moving your hips side to side and lean to turn and there is a front brake. Very durable, even with heavy usage I have not had to change out the wheels or replace anything after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: The Shorters

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy 1st Scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 6yr old daughter. My husband assembled it very easily and quickly. 2hrs after her first use of it--- with no prior scooter experience--- she was breezing around the living room floor in glee!! Handle height does not seem adjustable for long term use or taller children. Otherwise--- GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: MissLou2425

customer_reviews.title: The hand brake makes it easy to stop and he can perform some pretty neat ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 10-year old son. He absolutely loves it! It's similar to his regular scooters, but it's different enough that he loves to ride it. It's simple to operate, just jump on and start moving from side-to-side. The hand brake makes it easy to stop and he can perform some pretty neat tricks on it. It was so much fun, that I had to buy a second one for my daughter. I've found myself jumping on it too....may have to purchase a third one soon!
customer_reviews.author: AACM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my ten year old nephew for Christmas, and he loves it! It's sturdy, and fun to ride. I've tried it a bit as well. I wish I would have known that "no fuss packaging" is just an unmarked cardboard box though. He had no idea what we gifted him until we got the thing put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 yr olds bday present. She has the radio flyer ziggle which she loves. She does like this but when you go in a circle it does go fast so we make her wear a helmet bc she fell once hitting her head on the driveway. All the neighbors take turns riding it bc they think it's so fun. For being 4 yrs old she did figure it out very quickly and easy for her to control
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2 from WI

customer_reviews.title: Fun little item for a 6 yo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 yo grandson after he outgrew the Ziggle. He loves it! It's fun to watch him ride around the local tennis courts and spin around in circles. He's fallen a few times, probably because he's a little daredevil, but nothing major broken. Knee and elbow protection is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Rattan

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable scooter - stay away
customer_reviews.text: We had this scooter for 6 weeks and my 3 kids keep falling off and making injuries, bruises. We used to have back in England very good quality Sporter flicker scooter for more than 2 years. My kids never fall off and it was easy to stop. It is very unfortunate that we missed the return window. But certainly don't want to keep it because it is dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Nikola

customer_reviews.title: Fun and exercise
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old son asked for this for his birthday. He loves and rides around on in it our driveway. His 7 year old brother now wants one as well! They have a lot of fun on it and it hasn't been like most things where they play with it for one day then it sits and collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: Night Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great birthday present for my kid. It seems a little less sturdy than most scooters but it does have more parts. The kids are always fighting over it and no one has gotten hurry yet after a week, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: William Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Best scooter ever for flat surfaces not for hills.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scooter. It’s easy to learn on and doesn’t require a huge amount of pavement. It’s also good for older kids. Definitely use with a helmet and knee pads.
customer_reviews.author: twinmommy

customer_reviews.title: 👍 we dig it
customer_reviews.text: We had difficulties getting the screws in. For ours the back screw holes didn’t line up well enough for the screw to be flush with the scooter. Yet, our son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice scooter
customer_reviews.text: We love this scooter. Our 3 yr old granddaughter can ride it although our 5 yr old is much more steady.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L. Freund

customer_reviews.title: it's a fun toy for her to use and ride with other ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her scooter. She doesn't try crazy tricks much, but overall, it's a fun toy for her to use and ride with other kids on the street, mostly as a way to move around and glide. She loves the "self propulsion" way this thing moves. As an adult, I've played around with it and love riding it. Solid and well made, these things are built to last. The Razor brand is the best.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely fun scooter!
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely fun scooter! Got this for my 7-year-old's birthday and her dad and I can't stay off of it either. All of the kids fight over it and neighbors and relatives ask their parents for it when they leave. I was wondering why we needed another scooter, but this is different and actually offers some exercise, unlike the electric scooter that you just stand on.
customer_reviews.author: thebridge

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Our son liked this for a while and then found himself bored with it. He went back to riding a bike, skateboarding or on his skates.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna Cullen

customer_reviews.title: FUN for kids
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than expected to assemble because of design. KIds love them until they fall off. Purchase helmets separate would love for them to be included.
customer_reviews.author: JW Ideas

customer_reviews.title: My son has two
customer_reviews.text: My son gets his exercise with his red scooter it was given to him as a gift but he wanted a different color so I got him the blue one too.
customer_reviews.author: mi3souls

customer_reviews.title: Challenge to assemble, but
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun. Ours arrived missing a piece, so we couldnt assemble the handlebar into the base. I contacted Amazon, who suggested I contact the manufacturer but gave me a partial credit for my trouble. I eventually got the missing piece. This was for my 9 year old son. The colors were perfect.. it's black and orange (his fav color). Unlike a regular scooter, you have t sway from side to side to move the scooter forward. Its lots of fun and such a great work out. My kids end up exercising and not realizing it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa - A Risque' Affair Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used her friend's wiggle scooter and instantly feel in love with it. After getting her very own wiggle scooter for her birthday she let my nieces try it and they too feel in love. I know know 4 very wiggley, very happy little girls!
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT ..
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT AND ALL... BUT IT DOES SEEM TO COME LOOSE SOMETIMES.. EVERY NOW ON THEN MY SON NEEDS ME TO RE-TIGHTEN THE HANDLEBAR AND EVEN THOUGH I TIGHTEN IT VERY WELL AFTER 2 WEEKS IT SEEMS TO COME A BIT LOOSE! NOT SURE IF IT'S JUST OURS OR ALL OF THEM DO THAT OR IF MY SON RIDES IT TOO HARD BUT HEY! SON IS HAPPY! TAKES ME 4 MIN TO RETIGHTEN HEX BOLTS, NO BIGGIE FOR ME BUT MAYBE FOR YOU IT IS OR MAYBE YOUR KID WILL RIDE IT LESS INTENSE THAN MINE? WHO KNOWS .. WORKS GREAT THOUGH!
customer_reviews.author: MR_BUYITNOW

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter approved! Now my other two grandchildren are wanting one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun transportation for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved this scooter! Easy for the 8 and 5 year old to hop on and go. The weight limit kept most of the adults off it. Need to get one that can handle >150#!
customer_reviews.author: mollysmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use! It is a little flimsy meant for smaller kids that are mature enough to use.
customer_reviews.author: nilza

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old boy loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was out of town, but I was able to put the scooter together, no problem. It comes in 4 parts with all necessary tools (2 allen wrenches). My son hasn't quite mastered how to produce momentum very well, but he enjoys trying to 'wiggle' back and forth to go forward. One issue is that the brake has too wide of a grip for him to brake properly. We live on a hill and he isn't allowed to go downhill yet, because he can't brake. He tries to squeeze it and we've adjusted the break screw, but he still can't stop the scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 6 yr old son. He has been on this literally all day long. He had no problems learning the moves to get him going and has had a blast. Would recommend this for kids. Keeps them active. Comes with attachments on the rear that keep it fine falling back. Great safety feature for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 sizes
customer_reviews.text: Great item. We had purchased the smaller version (this one) for our 7 year old and it was just right. We were worried about the size for our 10 year old so wet bought the xl and it was the right size too. Great toy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cougar598

customer_reviews.title: Razor PowerWing DELUXE - Great scooter!
customer_reviews.text: We got the Razor Powerwing Deluxe after reading the reviews (the green option at this page) as Christmas present to my 5 yo. It looks cool, looks well built and it was easy to assemble. It is great for him as he doesn't need to push it with one foot, just a little wiggle of your legs and it gains speed. Lot's of fun at the park, he loves it! Price was also better than in other places.
customer_reviews.author: A. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun and was exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun and was exactly what we wanted. It was a reasonable price. We had to put it together but was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this would be such an amazing vehicle. my son loves it. It is a joy to ride and watch. I want one for myself! They need to make one for adults who weigh 200lbs. This almost does the trick but not quite. But for my 60lb kid it is perfect. He flies around and never gets tired of it. It has very cool motion and can do awesome spins etc...
customer_reviews.author: Pippin Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 10 year old granddaughter's birthday in May and, I've been told by our daughter, that she is enjoying it every day! Is that testimony or what! It's easy, it's physical and it's fun, fun, fun! It is also transportation - using her body movements to propel it forward (fast) is a bonus. She likes it, I'm told, because it's more fun than a regular scooter. Excellent purchase I would say!
customer_reviews.author: Bible Believer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves it - safe good fun
customer_reviews.author: ftm2512

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old for his birthday and he loves it! It was a little hard to put together but very simple, only a few pieces. Works well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Cassiy Sartor

customer_reviews.title: Really fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a hit with all the neighborhood kids from ages 5 and up. Plenty big enough for adults too. Lots of fun to ride; swivels well to provide self propel and feels great cruising and sliding the back out. The brake works well and is easy to modulate. The build quality is very good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: tech junkie

customer_reviews.title: this is one of the most fun toys I ever saw
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for a 7 yr old boy as a birthday present. His whole family took it over. & family friends. I've seen kids ranging in age from 4 to 53 tearing helter-skelter around on this machine. I have bought two more of these for other birthdays since then. Watch the price. It seems to go up & down a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scooter!
customer_reviews.text: My kids went crazy when this arrived! We bought it for our 10 year old but our 8 and 3 year olds also love to play on it. This is a well built scooter. Very durable and sturdy. Very easy to work!! Would defiantly buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great scooter!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the PowerWing for my daughter for her 12th birthday, and it has really exceeded my expectations. She is quite good at most scooters and ripsticks, riding something almost constantly. The thing that I liked about this particular scooter, though, besides being very cool-looking, is that even I could ride it. It's actually very stable, but also very fun to ride. I definitely like it better than her Razor scooter.
customer_reviews.author: LV

customer_reviews.title: Inventive and a crowd pleaser!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was not on my son's Christmas list, but we bought it thinking he may enjoy something different. We were right! This scooter is one of the first toys pulled out of the garage when friends come over, and we have considered buying another one for friends to play with. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Organized Mom!

customer_reviews.title: They love playing around in the driveway
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased TWO of these now for both my kids. They love playing around in the driveway. Bought them for my 6 year old and 9 year old......they can both handle it just fine. Even my 11 year old likes to hop on for a turn sometimes. Fun toy and I got it for MUCH cheaper on amazon than I found locally in any stores.
customer_reviews.author: kcmommy03

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old son loves this
customer_reviews.text: My son played on this scooter at his 8 year old friend's house. Kept him occupied for hours as he figured out how to get the thing moving my wiggling his hips back and forth. Still resorts to using his foot to scoot sometimes. There's still plenty of room for him to 'grow into' this scooter, which is why I thought is was good investment and it can be passed down to his younger brother. Careful though as the footboard can 'swing' around and get you in the shins/ankles - ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Days!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 Year Old Step Son received one of these for Christmas. We have a about 15 kids on our street ranging from 6 to 15 and every one of them LOVE this scooter! I actually took a spin on it and it was so fun! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: MrsTDS

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was super happy to get the scooter for her birthday is ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super happy to get the scooter for her birthday is some assembly required which I'm not the best at but it's so cute and it's cheap comparable to the Y flicker
customer_reviews.author: Reeva Bishop

customer_reviews.title: if you can't balance, this is great for you
customer_reviews.text: My kids never could use the traditional razor scooters and they have a difficult time balancing. This is great for them because they can stand on this without falling over. It also requires them to shift their weight and the scooter moves on its own. We really like this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferras-Nuckles

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter rode1 time, it flipped her backwards!!! I then rode it, it flipped me backwards also!!! wanted to return for refund! probably had to long! dangerous!! I ordered 3 different types of razor scotters all great but this one
customer_reviews.author: mawmawkat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 6 year old granddaughter. Huge hit. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Folk

customer_reviews.title: Broke after under three months
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 2.5 months! Very disapointed. I gave it one star because while my daughter who is under 75 pounds by the way was riding it she had a good time so I gave it one star. Other than that 2.5 months for 65 bucks not cool...
customer_reviews.author: DaveLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Present.
customer_reviews.text: My friends Grand son was quite happy and excited with it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel D Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Fun Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter loves this!! My 7 year old son rides it too to pop the wheelies! Great product and easy to put together! Would definitely buy another
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ward

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: This is really fun but theWheels get messed up really easily and I wish you had a justable handlebars but other than that it's a great product and I recommend you buy it if you're looking for a cheap drifting Caster scooter.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Best gift of Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter began riding one of these at her friend's house. She was 4 at the time, and I was waiting to end up in the ER! She mastered it quickly and asked for one for Christmas. It is quite pricey, compared to other scooters, but was was worth the investment. You can see her core muscles getting a great workout while she is having a blast! It is sturdy. It was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: fun and a good workout
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this scooter and she loves it. I tried it and I have to say, it is a great workout! It takes a lot to get it moving and fast. You have to sway back and forth to get it to move, which is different from regular scooters that you kick off with. The color was perfect for my pink loving daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa - A Risque' Affair Book Blog

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kids for Christmas. They and all the kids and our neighborhood love it. Love watching all the children playing with it. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: K. Detro

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: My son steals this from my daughter all of the time. It is pretty fast, but it looks like a great work out. I told my son it looks like great exercise for a football player as the fast side to side motion you need to do mimics football drills. You can do cool spinning moves as well. It seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: JJP

customer_reviews.title: More colors please
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this razor powerWing scooter as a gift for my goddaughter. At first glance she hated it but when her friend showed her how it worked she LOVED IT! She wanted it in green, I bought her a can of spray paint & handed it to her father :-)
customer_reviews.author: Doreen twinmomNJ

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this..so happy it gets him off the couch. Only rode indoors so far..hope the wheels hold up when the weather warms up and rides it outside.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: I love it too
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old son and he loves. Who am I kidding. I love it too! Do they make an adult size???? It's not a typical scooter. It moves by your wiggle motion and spins around and is all kids of fun! Seems pretty durable too, as momma hasn't broken it when she sneaks in rides. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carisa Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: We all love our new powerwing! My husband enjoyed taking kids out for outdoor time just so he could ride it. Heavier adults can't go up slight inclines like our driveway, but my 5 yr old son showed us it can be done, lol. He and his 7 yr old sister caught on really fast. You just wiggle your lower body a certain way and you're moving with ease, and there's a hand brake lever on the handle in case it's too fast for you=)
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scooter
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these scooters for our 2 boys ages, 10 & 11. They both loved it. The scooters are easy to handle, the manoevreability is outstanding and they are extremely silent. It is a great toy, my 4 year old son can easilly manoeuvre it and so also can adults. You can do many stunts on it and I cannot see anyone outgrowing this easiy. I purchased these scooters based on the excellent reviews similar to this which I read. I was not disappointed, in fact, I was surprised that it was such a great scooter and I definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dwarika

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The product was much sturdier than I expected. The wheels seem to be of good quality. My daughter absolutely loves it. I would see no reason to buy the competitors version which is almost twice the cost. Highly recommend this gift for kids.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pann

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely fun ride.
customer_reviews.text: My son got one of these for his birthday after he and I played for quite some time on my cousins scooter. It's quite a unique riding experience. I just wish I had more smooth surfaces for my son to use this thing on. It rode amazing on smoothed polished concrete like my families car port!
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as described
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect thank you! I wish it would have came in a box that didn’t show the pictures on it though
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old says that it's a little "tippy" but, that could just be due to a light weight rider. Otherwise, fun!
customer_reviews.author: KNevill

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this and so do I!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun!~ keeps her entertained when i am out in the yard doing yard work. Have had this many months now and it is holding up perfectly. Highly recommend! WOuld buy again. But wont need to. I hop on it too some times. it really is a lot of fun wiggling back and forth to make it go. Good exercise for the hips too. :)
customer_reviews.author: XIANSWER

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR A 4 YEAR OLD
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS BOUGHT FOR MY FOUR YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER ALINA, SHE LOVES IT AND I MADE SURE TO GET THE HELMUT, KNEE AND ELBOW PADS ALSO, SINCE ALINA HAS A BROTHER AND TRIES FOR HIS TOYS AND I BOUGHT ONE FOR HER BROTHER IN MAY FOR HIS BIRTHDAY I DECIDED TO BUY ONE FOR ALINA AND SO HAPPY I DID.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together (at least it was for the friend who put it together for me! ha!) The brakes work very well and my daughter says it has a smooth ride. She's 10 and the size is just right. Nicely construtcted.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it. As does his 10 year old brother. Shipped well, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loves it! so does the other kids in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.author: doreen roohan

customer_reviews.title: Had to return the item after receiving it due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the item after receiving it due to a defect with either the charging unit or battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: ligman

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with razor products!
customer_reviews.text: Buying gifts for my grandsons is not always easy, but this gift proved to be a hit this Christmas! It's fun and it's not like other scooters. A little wiggle is how it goes faster. :) Amazon had this product when I could not find it anywhere else, and I was so lucky to get it at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Bearings broke after less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 8 year old son. He is around 70lbs. He has lots of other toys so he didn't ride it much. Just yesterday he complained that the handlebar wouldn't turn. The bearings were shot! What the heck! This thing was expensive.
customer_reviews.author: JStoner

customer_reviews.title: You Kids Will Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to assemble and granddaughter learned how to use it in 20 minutes. This Razor is well made and will last a long time along with multiple kids.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Fun while getting good exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with our recent purchase of this Razor! It took my daughter a little practice, but she loves it. It rolls really smoothly, and she loves the color. It wouldn't hurt to have knee, elbow pads and a helmet on hand to be on the safe side!
customer_reviews.author: JBV03

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement. Great for kids no more than four
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Purchased this for my my nieces ages 5 and 7 and this scooter was too short. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wrong product

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 4 year old granddaughter and it is great my 9 year old grandson tried it and thought ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old granddaughter and it is great my 9 year old grandson tried it and thought it was fast and a lot of fun . So, it looks like it should be a great scooter for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Janie S

customer_reviews.title: This scooter is so much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is so much fun!!!! I bought this for my daughter for her birthday and I love to ride it as much as she does! When the neighbor kids are out they want to ride it too. So much fun, everyone should own one!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Total fun for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old bought this with his birthday money and rides it almost every day. The neighbor kids and his older brother are always eager to take a turn! (And, moms- don't tell your kids- This doesn't tip near as easily as a "regular" scooter).
customer_reviews.author: Thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I can hardly get our son to stop riding his new Razor PowerWing. I've even found myself riding it every once in awhile. It was an Awesome purchase and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cathcart

customer_reviews.title: for kids yet i use it
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it for indoor and outdoor use.we as a family love riding it inside our home...its so cool to just go to the door on it... i know its meant for kids, but its strong and smooth. i will get another for my other son as soon as he is old enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. D.

customer_reviews.title: ... after Christmas but I'm sure my grand son would love
customer_reviews.text: It is a Christmas gift can't give to much rating on this one until after Christmas but I'm sure my grand son would love it
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun ride for my 7 year old son & his friends as young as 4. And, when I get a turn, what a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Got this for a 5 yo - very easy for him to operate and will provide hours of ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 5 yo - very easy for him to operate and will provide hours of endless fun !!
customer_reviews.author: Shamrockron

customer_reviews.title: This has held up very well with huge use over ...
customer_reviews.text: This has held up very well with huge use over the two years. My son loves to do tricks. with it!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Good fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves to play outdoors and this is another good ride for her active lifestyle. It was missing a part upon delivery from the factory that held the handlebar in place, but it is the same part used on my daughter's old bike, so I salvaged that and made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Very strong good quality. It seems to be so much fun ...
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves it. Very strong good quality. It seems to be so much fun that I would love to take it for a spin.
customer_reviews.author: Amz_Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift this Christmas--I want one now too!
customer_reviews.text: NO need to write a verbose review. I purchased this for my almost 6 year old son and not only does he love it, but I love it too! My husband was disappointed though to see that the weight limit was just over 140 lbs...I could see he was full of envy as I scooted around on it! Best scooter out there. having both feet on at the same time avoids the one sided uneven development of muscles/balance etc that the usual kick scooter creates...ENJOY!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 5year old for xmas, he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5year old for xmas, he learned very quick how to use it, rides it around in the house with no problem, he really enjoys riding on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinolover75

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the Rip Stick
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son loves this scooter. He got the rip stick last year and just couldn't quite get the hang of it. The Powerwing is much easier to use and WAY safer. He also has a razor regular scooter but rides the Powerwing now all the time. I would highly recommend it. It was easy to put together too. The only drawback that I see is that the height of the handles is not adjustable like the razor scooter. I would find it difficult for say, a 5 year old, to steer.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi L. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old daughter and she loves it. Very easy to put together and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun, but keep in mind this is made for flat ground!
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter, love that it sways back and forth. Lots of fun and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A

customer_reviews.title: Razor PowerWIng Caster Scooter (Black)
customer_reviews.text: We received this product in a timely fashion and my son was so happily surprised to get this for his birthday. This is a great gift for any kid who wants to be able to have more control as they whip from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Nia S. Adero

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a birthday gift for my six year ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my six year old, and she loves it! She calls it her "wiggle scooter."
customer_reviews.author: Leah W

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was money well spent! Santa brought this for my son last year (5.5) and he rides it everyday. All the neighborhood kids love it. Be careful though, it turns FAST!
customer_reviews.author: E. Baker Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Riding the wind
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old Granddaughter absolutely loves it. She says she feels like she's flying and it takes very little effort for her to get it up to fast speed. She loves doing flying circles and loop to loops, she keeps up with her mom who is riding a bike. It was a very good investment. She gets plenty of exercise on it. I would highly recommend this product. She has a blast every time she rides it.
customer_reviews.author: TC Reo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Unique
customer_reviews.text: Had never seen these before But I purchased 2 they were easy to assemble very sturdy and my boys of 7 and 8 years old love them it was the perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT scooter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 y/o grandson and he absoutely LOVES it! Its range of motion adds a little more fun to the overall riding experience; spinning circles and such. Lightweight, yet sturdy. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Dion

customer_reviews.title: razor wings flys!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a razor wing for our grandson who loved it! Learning to ride it went smoothly and quickly. Our grandaughter who has the more traditional style cooter tried it and was sold on it. We purchased her a new razor wing too! It does all it is advertised to do!
customer_reviews.author: DWal

customer_reviews.title: Love the power wing
customer_reviews.text: my sons love it, It keeps them occupied for hours. well built, sturdy, takes abuse well form our boys. Make sure your child wears a helmet ! They graduated from the original razor scooter which they also beat up and it held up well too.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly liskey

customer_reviews.title: was everthing i wanted it to be!
customer_reviews.text: I found that ordering this item on line was less pricey than buying in stores which I reserched. I was so happy that it was identical to what I seen in department stores so i was not dossapointed at all.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

product_meta.title: Razor PowerWing Caster Scooter
product_meta.description: A totally rippin’ side-to-side ride! The three-wheeler is all grown up and ready to rock! The latest craze from Razor, the Powerwing is a totally radical new way to ride. Just move your body side to side– the awesome three-wheeled design gets you going and keeps you moving. Mastering sideways drifting and 360 spins is simple and fun, so hop on for some super freaky freestyle fun! For ages 6 and up. Maximum rider weight of 143 pounds. The buyer and rider of all Razor scooters are responsible for knowing and obeying all local, state and federal regulations regarding the riding and use of all Razor scooters.
feature_bullets: Fun trick scooter with pair of rear caster wheels
Caster wheels propel scooter with a twist of the feet
Ideal for performing kick-outs, side drifts and spin-outs
Durable steel frame, 125mm polyurethane front wheel with hand brake
Features Foam grips and removable stability bars
